duties_responsibilities.duty: Teach middle school or high school mathematics courses including Pre-Algebra, Algebra, Geometry, and Calculus.
Develop and implement lesson plans to engage and challenge students in the subject matter.
Manage classroom behavior and create a conducive learning environment.
Conduct student assessments and provide feedback on academic performance.
Communicate with parents, colleagues, and administrators to discuss student progress and educational goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or higher in Mathematics or related field
